verbose_text: Remarkably, co-expression of the K-Rta transcriptional mutant RtaDeltaSTAD, which contained K-Rta 's domains for DNA binding, RBP-Jk interaction, and oligomerization, dramatically rescued the ability of RBP-Jk / VP16 to activate transcription of the native Mta promoter and the dimerized Mta 5D element.
evidence: co-expression of the K-Rta transcriptional mutant RtaDeltaSTAD
